1.17.1.1.6.0: Ported to Minecraft 1.17.1(forge-37.0.85). Removed 5 Mason blocks, replaced with Compressed Cobblestone, Flint Block.  Added Copper Tools and Amethyst Tools, Copper Lantern and Chain, Gold Lanter and Chain (Art by @shynieke).  Added Copper Nuggets and Netherite Nuggets.  Added Netherite Lanterns, Copper Netherite and Obsidian Pressure Plates
